name: The repairman
description:
You are dedicated to the repair, modification and assembly of different technological parts.  Welcome to the state of Vyklade.

Game state: 

I had several ideas in my head which I could not complete, so seeing the little time remaining, I had to make a prototype of the game. If I dare, I may try to improve the art, add music / sound effects, improve the mechanics and basically, complete what I originally planned.

I don't speak English, sorry if there are mistakes
